<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<company>
    <agency agencyId="1">
        <agencyName>Agency 1</agencyName>
        <agencyAddress>Agency Address 1</agencyAddress>
        <agencyPhone>123456789</agencyPhone>
        <customers>
            <customer customerId="c10000">
                <customerName>Customer 1</customerName>
                <customerEmail>customer1@mail.com</customerEmail>
                <customerPhone>123456789</customerPhone>
            </customer>
            <customer customerId="c20000">
                <customerName>Customer 2</customerName>
                <customerEmail>customer2@mail.com</customerEmail>
                <customerPhone>123456789</customerPhone>
            </customer>
        </customers>
        <orders>
            <order orderId="o10000">
                <customerId>c10000</customerId>
                <orderDate>2017-05-05</orderDate>
                <orderDetails>
                    <orderDetail orderDetailId="od10001">
                        <productId>1</productId>
                        <numberProducts>10</numberProducts>
                        <price>1111110</price>
                    </orderDetail>
                    <orderDetail orderDetailId="od10002">
                        <productId>2</productId>
                        <numberProducts>10</numberProducts>
                        <price>2222220</price>
                    </orderDetail>                  
                </orderDetails>
            </order>
            <order orderId="o20000">
                <customerId>c20000</customerId>
                <orderDate>2017-05-05</orderDate>
                <orderDetails>
                    <orderDetail orderDetailId="od20001">
                        <productId>3</productId>
                        <numberProducts>10</numberProducts>
                        <price>1111110</price>
                    </orderDetail>
                    <orderDetail orderDetailId="od20002">
                        <productId>4</productId>
                        <numberProducts>10</numberProducts>
                        <price>2222220</price>
                    </orderDetail>
                </orderDetails>
            </order>
        </orders>
    </agency>
</company>
